snippet: A State Supreme Court justice criticized the State University of New York for trying to close the struggling Brooklyn hospital after assuming management in 2011.
abstract: New York State Supreme Court Judge Carolyn E Demarest orders Long Island City Hospital in Cobble Hill to be returned to previous owners Continuum Health Partners, nullifying 2011 transfer to State University of New York; castigates SUNY for trying to shut down hospital, saying transfer to state university system was allowed with understanding that it would continue to serve as a hospital; Continuum says it has no interest in taking back the hospital.
lead_paragraph: A State Supreme Court justice criticized the State University of New York for trying to close the struggling Brooklyn hospital after assuming management in 2011.

headline.main: Judge Rejects Long Island College Hospital’s Ownership Deal
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects Ownership Deal for Hospital
